title: Tiny Lights Discography
description:
Tiny Lights is a folk rock band whose core comprised musicians Donna Croughn (later of Bewitched), Andy Demos, Dave Dreiwitz (later of Ween), John Hamilton and Jane Scarpantoni. Jane Scarpantoni left the band after the release of the band's third album and began a fruitful career as a session musician, working with popular artists such as Lou Reed, Bob Mould, Barkmarket, 10,000 Maniacs, R.E.M., The Indigo Girls, Bruce Springsteen, Helmet, Firewater, Swans and the Lounge Lizards.

contains:
(1985) Prayer for the Halcyon Fear
(1988) Hazel's Wreath
(1990) Hot Chocolate Massage
(1992) Stop the Sun, I Want to Go Home
(1994) Milky Juicy
(1995) The Young Person's Guide to Tiny Lights [compilation]
(1997) The Smaller the Grape, the Sweeter the Wine

genre: Folk Rock
format: v0 mp3
